name: Nobunaga’s Ambition: Creation
description:
Nobunaga’s Ambition: Creation is a RPG-strategy game developed by Koei Tecmo. It came out on 21-12-2013. Koei Tecmo Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Nobunaga’s Ambition: Creation is available on PlayStation 3 and PlayStation 4.
